faculties_accepted: Industrial Engineering, Management, and Economic Systems
module_restrictions: B1 level in French is required if possible. The full course load is 30 ECTS per semester, but students may take at least 24 ECTS depending on home institution requirements.
visa_info: Long-Stay visas are required for stays exceeding 3 months. Students are required to register with the French Immigration and Integration Office (OFII) for a residence permit. Incoming students are responsible for securing their visa on time.

university.name: Paris-Saclay campus
university.cost_month: ~ €420 to 630/month before deduction of CAF financial help.

university.name: Metz campus
university.travel_time_to_paris: 1.30 h time from Paris Gare de l'Est (TGV)

university.name: Rennes campus
university.travel_time_to_paris: 1.30 h time from Paris Gare Montparnasse (TGV)

university_description: CentraleSupélec is a public institution in France that specializes in science and engineering. It was established on January 1st, 2015, through the merger of Ecole Centrale Paris and Supélec.
